name: Recycle (itch) (Eliza Szilagyi)
description:
“Anyone who has a continuous smile on his face conceals a toughness that is almost frightening.”      
― Greta Garbo

Recycle  is a 2D side scroller, story-telling game, which tells M's story. A stick figure character with a paper bag on it's head with no emotion drawn on.

If you are curious about M's journey, try out the game!

Showscase video: 

-> Point and click features,.

-> Walk and enjoy the music and the scenery the game offers.

-> Get immersed into a world that you have never felt before.
